::Ice:;

She stopped at the end of the ice field. She collapsed on her side. 
She fell into a drift of snow and layed there, on her side. She was 
breathing heavy and could see her breath in the cold air.  Her 
shoulder was hurtingher too much to continue on. Her shoulder was 
just pouring out the red liquid. She could barely move at all.

She heard a muffled voice on her commlink. But she couldn't make it 
out.
